description: Crisalim is an initiative founded in 2021-2022 aimed at empowering young people and vulnerable communities through food and cooking. It offers workshops that combine discussions on nutrition with shared meals, addressing food resilience and promoting healthy eating habits. Key projects include "Parcours Alim" for students and "ANAP," a solidarity restaurant program. By fostering community engagement and collaboration, Crisalim seeks to tackle food insecurity and enhance social connections among participants.
name: Crisalim
